articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects January 18 General Machinery Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects January 18 General Machinery Plant
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the January 18 General Machinery Plant whose all production processes have been modernized and cultured practice in production and life established at the highest level.
					 Enjoying a panoramic view of the plant, he said it has been face-lifted so freshly that one can hardly find traces of its past. New visitors to the plant will take it for a rest home, he added with a smile on his face.
					
					 He went round the revolutionary museum and the room dedicated to the history of the plant.
					
					 Saying that they were well built to display historic data and relics, he stressed the need to effectively conduct among the employees of the plant the education in the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the Party for it.
					
					 He toured different parts of the plant to learn in detail about its modernization and production.
					
					 The plant has been turned in keeping with the trend of the development of industry in the 21st century as it possessed enough modern equipment and established a flexible manufacturing system, made up of NC machine tools, robots, unmanned material carrier, automatic storehouse, etc., with domestic design, technology and efforts, he noted, saying: The plant has been put on a scientific, IT, automated and unmanned basis at a high level, making it possible to remarkably raise the production with less manpower and further improve the quality of products.
					
					 He urged the plant to continue directing big efforts to the work for overfulfilling the production plan on all indices by keeping the production going at a high rate, steadily developing the employees' technical knowledge and skills, improving the supply service, taking good care of equipment and keeping the inside and outside of the plant neat and tidy.
					
					 The plant has been successfully remodeled to meet the needs of the age of knowledge-based economy and a highly-civilized socialist nation at the time when exemplary and standard units for modernization appear at industrial establishments, rural community and other fields of the country, he said, adding: This provided a springboard for further developing the nation's machine-building industry, a standard for its modernization.
					
					 Saying that to update the industrial establishments is not a mere economic and technical work but an important work to translate into reality the noble intention of the great leaders and thoroughly implement the Party's policy, he ardently called for making the flame of modernization drive kindled at the plant rage furiously throughout all sectors and units.
					
					 He had a photo session with officials and employees of the plant.
					
					 Accompanying him were O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea (DPEG), on Dec. 15.
					 The message said the party members and the supporters for the DPEG paid highest respects to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the WPK and all the Korean people on behalf of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder and chairman of the DPEG, on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of HE Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 The message paid humblest homage to Kim Jong Il, a great sage who wisely led the struggle of the WPK for the prosperity of the Korean people, hoping to see further success in the struggle of the WPK for a just cause.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 12 off Press
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 12 off Press
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" Vol. 12, an encyclopedia of the Juche idea and the Songun idea which comprehensively deals with leader Kim Jong Il's works in a chronological order, was brought out in the DPRK.
					 The book contains 95 works he published between January and July in Juche 58 (1969).
					
					 The works deal with the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by leading the work of establishing the party's monolithic ideological system and intensifying the ideological education on a higher level in order to bring about an epochal phase in building a socialist economy, bolstering up the national defence capabilities and effecting a turn in art and literature.
					
					 Among the works there are those clarifying the idea that the people's army should never make even a step concession in establishing a thorough monolithic ideological system of the party by enhancing the role of its party organizations and political organs, in arming all the servicepersons with the revolutionary idea of the party and in increasing the national defence capabilities.
					
					 Contained in the book are works which indicate not only the principles and methods of the party work for radically improving the working method and style of party officials but the tasks and ways for ensuring the automation of production processes that will help lessen the workers' burden and increase the productivity, and manufacturing more machines indicative of the might of Juche-oriented industry.
					
					 The book also contains works which give clear-cut solution to practical issues arising in the socialist construction such as building many poultry farms and raising more hens at the cooperative farms to provide the people with enough meat and eggs.

articles.title: Young Koreans Propel Advance of Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Young Koreans Propel Advance of Korean Revolution: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article that the Workers' Party of Korea and people take it a pride to have huge contingent of young people guaranteeing the final victory of the Juche revolution. 
					 The article says:
					
					 The Korean revolution full of vitality advances by dint of the militant spirit and inexhaustible might of the huge contingent of the young people faithful to the revolutionary cause of the party.
					
					 The young Koreans who set the coordinates of their life on Mt. Paektu, sacred mountain of the revolution, are the ranks of loyalists always advancing straight under the leadership of the party.
					
					 The spirit of defending the leader unto death, the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters is being given steady continuity by the young people. 
					
					 The loyalty, bravery, boldness and stubbornness of the young Koreans in the new century of Juche are being given to fuller play in the struggle to implement the ideas of the party and uphold its policies.
					
					 They are the treasure of the party as they are building a highly-civilized socialist country on the strength of music which inspires the enthusiasm for the revolution and struggle and patriotism and propelling the dynamic advance of the country.
					
					 It is an unshakable faith of the young people to follow the party to the end of the world in any storm and stress and nothing can break the kinship between the party and the young people.
					
					 The steel-strong ranks of the young people dashing ahead toward the final victory closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un constitute a powerful driving force and strong support of the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Warmongers' Hysterics
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Warmongers' Hysterics
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean military group held a "meeting of leading officers of the whole army".
					 There the warmongers called for "establishing a posture" to counter the north's possible "strategic and tactical provocations" such as nuclear test and submarine ballistic missile launch next year and had a confab on an "operation for countering missile" with the U.S.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 It is nothing but a hysterical spasm of those who are taken aback by the military might of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 In fact, the "alliance" with the U.S. and the establishment of a "posture" touted by the south Korean military gangsters are a poor grumbling that would arouse only derision by people.
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the south Korean warmongers would escalate tension under the pretext of the failed talks between the authorities of the north and the south and put further spurs to the war provocation moves to invade the north under the worn-out signboard of "defence".
					
					 Now the situation on the Korean Peninsula has entered a serious phase due to the south Korean authorities' intentional move of pushing the talks to a rupture and the U.S. daily-escalating moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK as evidenced by "human rights" farce.
					
					 They are working hard to intensify the military confrontation racket next year, too, by shifting the blame for the failed talks on to the DPRK. Such fact discloses to the world their evil nature as war maniacs who undercut the efforts for dialogue and peace.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers should cool their heads overheated with war fever and stop running amuck. Regret always follows the foolish acts.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces Blamed for Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces Blamed for Ferry Sewol Disaster
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- It was newly disclosed that the south Korean ruling forces are to blame for the ferry Sewol disaster which stunned the world last year.
					The Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster held a pubic hearing in Seoul with the then chief of the marine police agency and a high-ranking official concerned of the "government" on Dec. 15.
					
					At the hearing, the authorities were confirmed not to have said truth when they asserted they mobilized more than 500 divers for the rescue operation at the time of disaster.
					
					In fact, the authorities set in motion less than 100 frogmen for the rescue who failed to enter the ferry even after the lapse of several days.
					
					The recent hearing also disclosed that the rescue operation was seriously hobbled by the ruling forces right after the disaster.
					
					The rescue team was only busy rescuing the captain and crewmen who fled the ferry and it did not approach the ferry though it could see through the window the children anxiously crying out for help.
					
					This being a hard fact, the ruling forces are evading the responsibility for the disaster and disturbing the probe into it in every way and ruthlessly repressing the protests of the people of various circles including the bereaved families.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Uruguayan Broadcasting Service on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Uruguayan Broadcasting Service on Its Website
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Devoted Service for the Popular Masses Is the Mode of Existence of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Source of Its Invincible Might" was posted on the website of the C. Equis 36 Radio Centenario of Uruguay on Dec. 8.
					 The website carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreign Organizations 
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries posted special write-ups on internet between December 7 and 9 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted articles under the titles "Eternal General Secretary of Workers' Party of Korea", "Mt. Paektu and Kim Jong Il" and "Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" illustrated with the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "Exploits Leader Kim Jong Il Performed for Cause of Korea's Reunification" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article praised the leader for bringing about two amazing north-south summits, the first of its kind since the national division, and providing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.
					
					 The Anti－Imperialist Forum of Germany said in an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il's Heritage" that Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche and developed the idea and line of attaching importance to the army and the military affairs into Songun idea as required by the new era, adding that this is a valuable heritage left by the leader to the Korean people and the progressive mankind.
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo posted an article titled "Kim Jong Il's Idea and Exploits Will Be Immortal" which praised Kim Jong Il's ideological and theoretical exploits and leadership feats.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Power of Independence".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Uganda, Sri Lanka and Indonesia between Dec. 10 and 13 on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise. 
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos dealing with the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un who consolidated the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK into an invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 There were also books and pictures introducing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il held higher the banner of Songun, resolutely foiling the imperialists' moves to stifle the country and reliably protecting the socialist cause and global peace and security at the end of the last century.
					
					 A member of the Board of Directors of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea who doubles as the chairman of the Committee of Self-Reliance Studies in Sri Lanka said that the Korean People's Army has grown to be an army strong in idea and faith and an invincible combat ranks prepared for both attack and defence and that the DPRK has ranked itself among satellite manufacturers and launchers and nuclear weapons states thanks to his Songun politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Russians
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Russians
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting and photo and book exhibition took place in Moscow on Dec. 16 under the sponsorship of the Russian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works and books and photos introducing the service personnel and people of the DPRK in their drive for building a thriving socialist country.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence to the memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 V.A.Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK who doubles as chairman of the Russian remembrance committee, praised Kim Jong Il as the great man who dedicated his all to the country and its people by carrying forward the noble idea of Kim Il Sung on believing in people as in Heaven.
					
					 A section chief of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences said that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits by formulating the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism, laying a foundation for the prosperity of the DPRK and providing a historic turning phase for national reunification.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by British Organization
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article titled "The Sun Is Immortal" illustrated with photos dealing with the undying exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 8 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his demise.
					 The article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il loved his country and people more than anyone else and dedicated his all to the reunification of Korea and everlasting prosperity of the nation.
					
					 It was his patriotic exploits which will remain long in the nation's history that he made sure that the historic Pyongyang summits were held and the north-south joint declarations were adopted to usher in the June 15 era of national reunification with his far-sighted wisdom and ardent patriotism in the efforts to accomplish the cause of national reunification, life-long desire of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Reverence for him pervaded the Korean Peninsula after the publication of the historic June 15 joint declaration whose main spirit is By Korean Nation Itself.
					
					 The south Korean public are praising him as the tender-hearted teacher of the nation and the sun of the national reunification.
					
					 Their boundless yearning and reverence for him are getting stronger as days go by.
					
					 He will always be alive as the sun in the hearts of humankind.

articles.title: Mirae Scientists Street Introduced by Myanmar Paper
articles.content:
Mirae Scientists Street Introduced by Myanmar Paper
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Myanmar paper The New Age carried an article titled "Mirae Scientists Street-Icon of Songun Culture in the DPRK" on Dec. 6.
					 The paper said:
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, looked round the Mirae Scientists Street.
					
					 The street perfect in terms of Juche character and national identity and peculiar for its originality and formative art was successfully completed within a period of one year.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was greatly satisfied with the best quality of the construction of the apartment houses such as 53-storeyed skyscraper.
					
					 The flats of apartment houses of the street on the bank of the Taedong River, benevolent present the WPK provided for the ordinary educators and scientists free of charge, will contribute to improving their livelihood.
					
					 The paper was illustrated with photos of the panoramic view of the street.

articles.title: British Organization Demands Abolition of SL in South Korea
articles.content:
British Organization Demands Abolition of SL in South Korea
 Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article demanding the abolition of the "Security Law" of south Korea on Dec. 8.
					 The article disclosed in detail the fact that the SL fabricated by the south Korean ruling quarters on Dec. 1, 1948 earned the notorious fame as a means of the ruling quarters for maintaining power and trampling down the progressive forces and as a repressive means for suppressing the people's movement for independence, democracy and national reunification.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the south Koreans can not expect elementary human rights, to say nothing of independence, democracy and national reunification as long as the SL is left intact, the article noted, concluding:
					
					 The anachronistic and fascist evil law SL should be abolished at once as it hinders the independent and democratic progress of society and does harm to the national reconciliation and unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige labores de Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige labores de Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las labores del Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero, en que todos los procesos de produccion fueron modernizados en nivel alto y la cultura en la produccion y la vida se ha establecido en el nivel supremo.
					Viendo el panorama de la fabrica, el Mariscal dijo con amplia sonrisa que es imposible encontrarse con los aspectos anteriores en todos los lugares de la planta y que las personas que la visitan por primera vez pueden pensarla no como una planta de maquinas, sino como un centro de reposo.
					
					Recorrio el Museo de la Historia Revolucionaria y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Los acondicionaron excelentemente y exhibieron bien los datos y objetos historicos, dijo y enfatizo la necesidad de realizar con escrupulosidad la educacion para difundir las hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y del partido impregnadas en el combinado a los militantes del partido y trabajadores de la fabrica.
					
					Averiguo detalles del estado de modernizacion y produccion en varios lugares del combinado.
					
					Senalo que no solo equiparon la fabrica con suficientes instalaciones modernas, sino que tambien establecieron el sistema de produccion flexible compuesto con las maquinas- herramienta de control numerico, robot industrial, camion de material sin piloto, almacen automatico, etc., apoyandose en el diseno, la tecnologia y las fuerzas propias preparando asi la empresa conforme a la tendencia del desarrollo industrial en el siglo XXI.
					
					Agrego que al realizar en el nivel alto la cientifizacion, la informatizacion, la automatizacion y la operacion sin piloto, pudieron aumentar bruscamente la cantidad de productos y mejorar su calidad ahorrando mucha mano de obra.
					
					Agrego que la fabrica debe seguir prestando las atenciones a las labores de normalizar la produccion para sobrecumplir en todos los indices el plan de produccion, de elevar sin cesar el nivel de tecnologia y habilidad de los empleados, de mejorar el servicio de abastecimiento, de cuidar bien las instalaciones y de acomodar y mantener el limpio el interior y el exterior de la fabrica.
					
					Cuando se levantan las unidades ejemplares y las estandarizadas de la modernizacion en varios dominios como fabricas, empresas y el campo rural, el Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero fue remodelado excelentemente conforme a la exigencia de la epoca de economia basada en intelectualidad y al Estado civilizado socialista, dijo.
					
					Por su resultado fueron preparados un trampolin del desarrollo y la norma de la modernizacion que permiten llevar a una etapa mas alta la industria de construccion de maquinaria del pais, agrego
					
					Acoto que el trabajo de modernizacion de las fabricas y empresas no es un simple asunto economico-profesional, sino la labor importante para practicar el noble proposito de los grandes Lideres y materializar estrictamente la politica del partido y exhorto fervientemente a extender las llamas de modernizacion encendidas por este combinado a todos los dominios y todas las unidades.
					
					El Mariscal se fotografio junto con los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron O Su Yong, Jo Yong Won y Hong Yong Chil.
